caption: nhl.com
description: Brandon Saad scored in overtime as the Nashville Predators fell 2-1 to the Chicago Blackhawks at the United Center on Saturday night.

name: Nashville Predators

description: The Predators outplay the Blackhawks for the majority of the game, but lose a 1-0 lead late, and ultimately fall in overtime.

description: Typically, the Predators starting goaltender - either Pekka Rinne or Juuse Saros - will lead the team onto the ice for warm-ups.

name: Nashville Predators

caption: nhl.com
description: The Nashville Predators Golden U program offers college students exclusive discounts and offers.
message:
College students! Don’t forget to enroll in our Golden U college program! The first social event of the season will take place on 10/19 - we're hosting a Preds away game watch party in the Bridgestone Arena Lexus Lounge for all students who are enrolled. Don’t miss out, sign up today!

description: It happened over and over again last summer.

caption: nhl.com
description: Matt Murray recorded a shutout and the Nashville Predators fell to the Pittsburgh Penguins by a 4-0 score on Saturday night at PPG Paints Arena.
message: "It's hard to say when you're losing 3-0 that it's a better effort, but for me, it's a step in the right direction, to play a game that we need to play. But we've still got a long way to go with that, too."
name: Nashville Predators

caption: nhl.com
description: The Predators remain in search of their first win of the season after getting blanked by Penguins goaltender Matt Murray in a Stanley Cup Final rematch.
message: That's not how that was supposed to go.
name: Nashville Predators

message: Preds fall 4-0. Time for some home cooking and the home opener in Smashville on Tuesday!
